meanings.sent1: She decided to start her project anew after making a mistake.
meanings.sent2: He had to read the instructions anew to understand them better.
meanings.sent3: The cat knocked over the vase, so the owner had to arrange the flowers anew.
meanings.sent4: The sun rose anew, painting the sky with vibrant colors.
meanings.sent5: The teacher explained the concept anew, making it easier to grasp.

meanings.definition: In a new or different way.
meanings.sent1: They approached the problem anew, trying a different strategy.
meanings.sent2: The artist expressed her emotions anew through her latest painting.
meanings.sent3: The magician performed the trick anew, surprising the audience once more.
meanings.sent4: The river flowed anew after the heavy rain, carving a new path.
meanings.sent5: The chef prepared the dish anew, adding a unique twist to the recipe.
